Dear Drank:
I have had a couple of talks with Dr* Russell
Potter who is the Director of the Institute of Arts
and Sciences at Columbia University, He is interested
in joining the NAEB. I don't know what the rules are
about applicants of this sort, but it would seem to me
that he might fall into your assodiate membership category,
in view of the fact that Columbia University is interested
in radio but they'haven't an AM or FM station*
Y0u know that they are planning a rather extensive
series of radio courses in cooperation with the national
Broadcasting Company,
We have had a considerable number of programs from
Teachers College and are contemplating some programs
for next year*
You know the policy on this matter so whatever you
do is O.K. with me — you might send him an application,
if there is such a thing, or a letter.
Best regards,
‘New York City’s Own Station”—830 Kc.
